import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './ItemCard.css' import { useState } from 'react' export const ItemCard = ( { category, id, thumbnail, title, brand, price, rating } ) =>{ const [productsIDs, setProductsIDs] = useState([]) const guardarLocalStorage = (id) => localStorage.setItem(`produtos`, id) const pegarLocalStorage = () => JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('produtos')) ?? [] console.log(pegarLocalStorage()) console.log(productsIDs) const handleSubmit = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() setProductsIDs //const dbCLient = pegarLocalStorage() //dbCLient.push('id') //guardarLocalStorage(dbCLient) } return(

{category}

{title}

{brand}

R$: {price},00

Avaliação: {rating}

) }
